rows.label: qst102202_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, hey - I know you guys!

rows.label: qst102202_msg0002
rows.name:
You fought together with
Vandham, right?

rows.label: qst102202_msg0003
rows.name:
Vandham actually took care of me
this one time back when I was little.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0004
rows.name:
I lived in Gula until recently,
but before that I lived in Invidia.
That was when I met him.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0005
rows.name:
Anyway, when I heard the big guy
had passed away, I just had to come
and pay my respects.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm about to head out on my first
mission as a member of the band.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0007
rows.name:
Hey, do you think you could
come along too?

rows.label: qst102202_msg0008
rows.name:
I'd love to have the chance to talk
about Vandham with you guys.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0010
rows.name:
We're meeting up with our squad
chief Corden in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0011
rows.name:
I was feeling a bit nervous, actually,
but now I have you guys to talk to,
I'm kind of looking forward to it!

rows.label: qst102202_msg0012
rows.name: I'll see you at the meetup point.
